knimeNode.name: RDKit Generate Coords
knimeNode.shortDescription: Generates coordinates (2D or 3D) for an input RDKit Mol column

fullDescription.intro: Generates coordinates (2D or 3D) for an input RDKit Mol column.
fullDescription.option: The column containing molecules to be modified
If checked, 3D coordinates will be generated. If not checked 2D coordinates (useful for displaying molecules in tables) will be generated.
If provided and 2D coordinates are being generated, the coordinates will be generated so that the piece of each molecule that corresponds to the template will be drawn in the same way.
